actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making a supplemental appropriation to the Environmental Protection Agency for reimbursement of the City of Bainbridge, Georgia, pursuant to section 206(a) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

summary.text: Makes a supplemental appropriation for fiscal year 1980 to the Environmental Protection Agency for reimbursement of the City of Bainbridge, Georgia, pursuant to the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

titles.title: A bill making a supplemental appropriation to the Environmental Protection Agency for reimbursement of the City of Bainbridge, Georgia, pursuant to section 206(a) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
